titles.title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to provide for cost of living adjustments in the rate of special pension paid to recipients of the Congressional Medal of Honor.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Benefits.

term.name: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

bill.summary: 6/19/1997--Introduced. Requires an identical adjustment to the rate of special pension paid to Medal of Honor recipients whenever there is an increase in benefit amounts payable under title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act.
